attachments.title: Over the Hills, a musical shit between McBess & ultranoir
attachments.text: For their first collaboration, ultranoir - the french web agency - and McBess invite you to discover 'Over the Hills', a digital experience based on music, design, 3D and creative programming.
attachments.fallback: Over the Hills, a musical shit between McBess & ultranoir

text: Pretty cool web project. I find it refreshing that it doesn't rely on (or hijack) scrolling like all the other experimental sites we've been seeing in the last year.
